ThingDef.label: riparius book
ThingDef.description:
Tiberium Riparius.

The green kind of Tiberium is the most common one.

It came to planet Earth a long time ago, long before this rim world has been infected.

This kind spreads the quickest, infecting big areas within days.

So be careful if you encounter any!

Avoid touching it no matter the cost.

The substance, no matter the kind, will infect any carbon based lifeform and crystalize it.

This ability makes it highly toxic.

Tiberium is an unkown type of mineral that converts anything and everything that is carbon-based around itself into Tiberium.

This happens due to reactions between Tiberium nuclei and the other material's nuclei.

ThingDef.label: vinifera book
ThingDef.description:
Tiberium Vinifera.

The blue kind of Tiberium, it is the "mature" form of green Tiberium as it evolved.

It is rare compared to the green Tiberium.

This kind spreads more slowly in comparision.

Be careful if you encounter any as it is still toxic!

This type explains the theory that Tiberium is more of a living being.

Tiberium in general mutates any life if it did not kill it at first.

These Tiberium lifeforms feed on Tiberium if they are animals, or spread it, if they are plants.

It is still unproven how much of living being Tiberium is.

Further investigation is needed.
